segments.text: I notice the kitchen setup, angled just right to see everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is intently drying her plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on, water filling the sink steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, it's overflowing onto the front!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading, her shoe soaked through.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on the stool, reaching high for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing a plate tooâ€”clever, but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for him if it tips; that fall would hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, palm up, eyes on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're in cahoots, a sweet sibling secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open wide, cookies tempting them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's light brightens the garden path outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a calm contrast to the indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll turn and catch them in time.
segments.speaker: PAR
